title: Presidio of San Francisco: Camping
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Eating & Sleeping     Camping              Campgrounds          Rob Hill Campground  Open April through November  Phone (415) 561-5447  Details Campground offers two group campsites (maximum 30 campers each), with a maximum 5 night stay. Reservations can be made through the Presidio Trust Special Events Office. Click here for more information about the Rob Hill campground. Click here for information on nearby campgrounds in the Marin Headlands.
